Definition at line 186 of file ht32f5xxxx_ledc.c.

void LEDC_ClockSourceConfig ( LEDC_SRC_Enum  Source)

Select the LEDC timer clock source.

Parameters:
Source,:specify the clock source of LEDC.
  • LEDC_SRC_PCLK
  • LEDC_SRC_LSI : Low speed internal clock.
  • LEDC_SRC_LSE : Low speed external clock.
Return values:
None

Definition at line 137 of file ht32f5xxxx_ledc.c.

void LEDC_COMxConfig ( u32  LEDC_COMxEN,
ControlStatus  Cmd 
)

Configure COMx's state of LEDC with specified pins.

Parameters:
LEDC_COMxEN,:This parameter can be any combination of the following values:
  • LEDC_COM0EN : Set LEDC COM0
  • LEDC_COM1EN : Set LEDC COM1
  • LEDC_COM2EN : Set LEDC COM2
  • LEDC_COM3EN : Set LEDC COM3
  • LEDC_COM4EN : Set LEDC COM4
  • LEDC_COM5EN : Set LEDC COM5
  • LEDC_COM6EN : Set LEDC COM6
  • LEDC_COM7EN : Set LEDC COM7
  • LEDC_COM8EN : Set LEDC COM8(Only support 54253 )
  • LEDC_COM9EN : Set LEDC COM9(Only support 54253 )
  • LEDC_COM10EN : Set LEDC COM10(Only support 54253 )
  • LEDC_COM11EN : Set LEDC COM11(Only support 54253 )
Cmd,:This parameter can be ENABLE or DISABLE.
Return values:
None

Definition at line 170 of file ht32f5xxxx_ledc.c.

void LEDC_Init ( LEDC_InitTypeDef *  LEDC_InitStruct)

Initialize the LEDC peripheral according to the specified parameters in the LEDC_InitStruct.

Parameters:
LEDC_InitStruct,:Pointer to a LEDC_InitTypeDef structure. Please note the following. 1. When LEDC is started, the LEDC_ClockSource, LEDC_ClockPrescaler and LEDC_DeadTime can't be changed, so LEDC_Init() will turn off the LED first.You need to restart LEDC by LEDC_Cmd(ENABEL). 2. The LEDC_DeadTime number must be less than the LEDC_Prescaler. Example: If LEDC_DutyClockNumber selects LEDC_DTYNUM_8, the valid LEDC_DeadTime ranges from 0 to 7. If LEDC_DutyClockNumber selects LEDC_DTYNUM_16, the valid LEDC_DeadTime ranges from 0 to 15. If LEDC_DutyClockNumber selects LEDC_DTYNUM_32, the valid LEDC_DeadTime ranges from 0 to 31. If LEDC_DutyClockNumber selects LEDC_DTYNUM_64, the valid LEDC_DeadTime ranges from 0 to 63.
Return values:
None

Definition at line 80 of file ht32f5xxxx_ledc.c.

void LEDC_IntConfig ( ControlStatus  NewState)

Enable or Disable Frame interrupt.

Parameters:
NewState,:This parameter can be ENABLE or DISABLE.
Return values:
None

Definition at line 154 of file ht32f5xxxx_ledc.c.

void LEDC_SetDeadTimeDuty ( u32  LEDC_DeadTimeDuty)

Configure the dead time duty. The LED brightness can be adjusted by adjusting the dead duty.

Parameters:
LEDC_DeadTimeDuty,:Deadtime Clock Numbers. The LEDC_DeadTimeDuty number must be less than the LEDC_DutyClockNumber(DTYNUM). Example: If LEDC_DutyClockNumber selects LEDC_DTYNUM_8, the valid LEDC_DeadTime ranges from 0 to 7. If LEDC_DutyClockNumber selects LEDC_DTYNUM_16, the valid LEDC_DeadTime ranges from 0 to 15. If LEDC_DutyClockNumber selects LEDC_DTYNUM_32, the valid LEDC_DeadTime ranges from 0 to 31. If LEDC_DutyClockNumber selects LEDC_DTYNUM_64, the valid LEDC_DeadTime ranges from 0 to 63.
Return values:
None

Definition at line 231 of file ht32f5xxxx_ledc.c.

void LEDC_SetPolarityMode ( u32  LEDC_COMxPOL,
u32  LEDC_SEGxPOL,
LEDC_Mode  mode 
)

Set the output polarity of COM and SEG.

Parameters:
LEDC_COMxPOL,:This parameter can be any combination of the following values:
  • LEDC_COM0POL : Set COM0 polarity
  • LEDC_COM1POL : Set COM1 polarity
  • LEDC_COM2POL : Set COM2 polarity
  • LEDC_COM3POL : Set COM3 polarity
  • LEDC_COM4POL : Set COM4 polarity
  • LEDC_COM5POL : Set COM5 polarity
  • LEDC_COM6POL : Set COM6 polarity
  • LEDC_COM7POL : Set COM7 polarity
  • LEDC_COM8POL : Set COM8 polarity(Only support 54253 )
  • LEDC_COM9POL : Set COM9 polarity(Only support 54253 )
  • LEDC_COM10POL : Set COM10 polarity(Only support 54253 )
  • LEDC_COM11POL : Set COM11 polarity(Only support 54253 )
LEDC_SEGxPOL,:This parameter can be any combination of the following values:
  • LEDC_SEG0POL : Set SEG0 polarity
  • LEDC_SEG1POL : Set SEG1 polarity
  • LEDC_SEG2POL : Set SEG2 polarity
  • LEDC_SEG3POL : Set SEG3 polarity
  • LEDC_SEG4POL : Set SEG4 polarity
  • LEDC_SEG5POL : Set SEG5 polarity
  • LEDC_SEG6POL : Set SEG6 polarity
  • LEDC_SEG7POL : Set SEG7 polarity
mode,:LED layout mode. SEG polarity COM polarity -------------------------------------------------------
  • COMMON_CATHODE : non-inverted non-inverted
  • COMMON_CATHODE_WITH_NPN : non-inverted inverted
  • COMMON_ANODE_WITH_PNP : inverted non-inverted
  • COMMON_ANODE_WITH_NPN : inverted inverted
Return values:
None

Parameters:
